programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science in Medical Informatics

entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Diploma in Computing fields : Minimum CGPA of 2.50.  - Diploma (Level 4, MQF) in Non-Computing : Minimum CGPA of 2.75 - Candidates with CGPA below 2.50 but more than 2.00 may be admitted subject to a rigorous assessment.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass with a minimum Grade of C (GP 2.00) in any TWO (2) subjects..  Credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Pass with a minimum CGPA of 2.00.  Credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 Foundations in Medicine Computer Architecture & Operating Systems Health Informatics Fundamentals Programming Fundamentals Technical Writing Semester 2 System Analysis & Design Health Databases & Data Management Exploring Artificial Intelligence in Health Mobile OS & Programming Communication Skills Short Semester Appreciation of Ethics & Civilisations Philosophy & Current Issues Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 2 Bahasa Kebangsaan A Critical Thinking  Year 2 Semester 3 Electronic Health Records Healthcare TechnologyManagement Advanced Programming Data Science & Analytics Elective Semester 4 Medical Internet of Things Medical coding standards Fundamentals of Medical Imaging Elective Elective Short Semester Professionalism & Ethics in Healthcare Khidmat Masyarakat & Ko Kurikulum  Year 3 Semester 5 Internet & Networking Health Data Visualisation Computer Security & Data Privacy Research Methodology Elective Semester 6 Internship Undergraduate Project

Diploma.text: Diploma in Computing fields : Minimum CGPA of 2.50.  - Diploma (Level 4, MQF) in Non-Computing : Minimum CGPA of 2.75 - Candidates with CGPA below 2.50 but more than 2.00 may be admitted subject to a rigorous assessment.

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery, Bachelor of Obstetrics (MB BCH BAO) (2.5 + 2.5) with Royal College of Surgeons and University College Dublin, Ireland

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
ABB in : Biology Chemistry Mathemathics or Physics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
1 B3, 4 B4’s: · Biology · Chemistry · Physics · Mathematics or Additional Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
ABB in : Biology Chemistry Mathemathics or Physics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
CGPA 3.50 in 3 subjects : Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma:
36 points (including bonus points) with a minimum of 2 HL and 1 SL in 3 Science subjects. Attained a minimum score of 5 at Higher Level each in Biology and Chemistry.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
ATAR 93 with average of 90% or the equivalent of B in any 3 subjects : Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia

course_content.core: Year 1 - 3 IRELAND Systems : Cardiovascular Central Nervous System Gastrointestinal & Hepatology Genito-urinary Haematology Locomotor Renal, Endocrine & Breast Respiratory Psychology Sociology Tropical Medicine YEAR 1 - 3 IRELAND Each system consists of: Anatomy Biochemistry Evidence-Based Medicine Genetics Introduction to Clinical Practice Microbiology Pharmacology Physics in Medicine Physiology Public Health & Epidemiology Year 3 -5 ear 3 -5 MALAYSIA Clinical Skills Communication Skills Medicine Surgery Orthopaedics Family Medicine Paediatrics Public Health Psychiatry Ear, Nose & Throat Forensic & Legal Medicine Obstetrics Ophthalmology Anaesthesiology Emergency Medicine Radiology Clinical Elective

credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia

entry_requirements_raw.Degree: BSc in Science CGPA 3.0 (out of 4.0) or above .
entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: ABC or BBB in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: ABC or BBB in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: CGPA 3.0 (out of 4.0) in 3 subjects: Biology Chemistry Mathematics or Physics providing the course is not less than 1 year in the same accredited institution AND 5B’s each in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Additional Mathematics -Physics -Another subject In SPM/O-Level or its equivalent.
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: 80 ATAR provided the subjects include: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.

course_content.core:
Semester 1
Fundamental of Human Biology (5 credits)
Fundamentals of Medicinal & Pharmaceutical Chemistry (5 credits)
Medical Applications of Physics (5 credits)
Musculoskeletal System, Nervous System & Bioelectricity (5 credits)
Communication and Professionalism in the Health Science 1 (5 credits)
Biomedical Laboratory Sciences (5 credits) Semester 1 Semester 2
Thermoregulation, Special Senses, Endocrine System, Reproductive System (5 credits)
Introduction to Health and Disease (5 credit)
Medicinal & Pharmaceutical Chemistry II (5 credits)
Respiratory System, Gastrointestinal System (5 credits)
Cardiovascular System, Biological Fluids, Renal Function (5 credits)
Communication and Professionalism in the Health Science 2 (5 credits)
Biomedical Laboratory Sciences (5 credits) Semester 2

Degree.text: BSc in Science CGPA 3.0 (out of 4.0) or above .

A-Level.text: ABC or BBB in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.

STPM.text: ABC or BBB in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.

Foundation.text: CGPA 3.0 (out of 4.0) in 3 subjects: Biology Chemistry Mathematics or Physics providing the course is not less than 1 year in the same accredited institution AND 5B’s each in: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Additional Mathematics -Physics -Another subject In SPM/O-Level or its equivalent.

SACE/WACE.text: 80 ATAR provided the subjects include: -Biology -Chemistry -Mathematics or Physics.

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: 3As 2Bs (AAABB) in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and one other subject.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: 3As 2Bs (AAABB) in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and one other subject.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: B4 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics or Mathematics or Advanced Mathematics.

course_content.core: Semester 1 General Physics 1 General Chemistry 1 General Biology 1 General Mathematics Language, Communication & Study Skills 1 Basic IT Semester 2 General Physic 2 General Chemistry 2 Human System 1 Language, Communication & Study Skills 2 Professionalism in the Health Sciences Semester 3 Physics for Health Sciences Chemistry for Health Sciences Human System 2 Introduction to Diseases Diagnostics, Therapeutics Elective Projects

SPM.text: 3As 2Bs (AAABB) in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and one other subject.

O-Level.text: 3As 2Bs (AAABB) in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and one other subject.

UEC.text: B4 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics or Mathematics or Advanced Mathematics.
